data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during Prins van Oranje cruise from Curacao to the Netherlands started at 1816-03-06
Ship: Prins Van Oranje, Voyage: Curacao - Nederland, Company: MAR, Other ship information: BEMAND MET 250 KOPPEN EQUIPAGIE EN GEARMEERD MET 20 STUKKEN KANON A 24 POND EN 2 12 PONDERS
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
